original: zhes nas rab 'byor /
analyzed: zhes nas rab 'byor /
translated: Then, Subhūti,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu la sbyor te /
analyzed: sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu la sbyor te /
translated: connect beings with skillful means to the emptiness of inherent nature and to cause and effect.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bkod cing /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bkod cing /
translated: They establish them in the emptiness of inherent nature

original: rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston to //🔽yang dag par skul lo //
analyzed: rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston to // yang dag par skul lo //
translated: and gradually show them unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽They encourage them.

original: yang dag par gzang bstod do //
analyzed: yang dag par gzang bstod do //
translated: They praise them.

original: yang dag par dga' bar byed do //🔽gzhog go / 'dul lo /
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar byed do // gzhog go / 'dul lo /
translated: They delight them.🔽They establish them.🔽They tame them.

original: rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rab tu 'god do //
translated: They fully establish them.

original: de'ang @133b 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi /
analyzed: de'ang @133b 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi /
translated: And that is through worldly convention,

original: don dam par ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ma yin no //
translated: not ultimately.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang / gang gis thob par bya ba dang / gang thob par bya ba gang yang med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang / gang gis thob par bya ba dang / gang thob par bya ba gang yang med do //
translated: There is nothing in the emptiness of inherent nature that is attained, nothing by which it is attained, and nothing that is attained.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid de /
translated: The limit of reality is emptiness.

original: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: Abiding in that, bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of sentient beings.

original: de la sems can du dmigs pa med do //
analyzed: de la sems can du dmigs pa med do //
translated: Therein, sentient beings are not observed.

original: sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do //
analyzed: sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do //
translated: The designation of sentient beings is not observed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
translated: it is because all phenomena

original: sems can gyis dben pa'o; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: sems can gyis dben pa'o; ;rab 'byor /
translated: are devoid of sentient beings.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na /
translated: Moreover, Su­bhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they see sentient beings who are lazy and have little perseverance.

original: 'di ltar lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul te /
analyzed: 'di ltar lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul te /
translated: With skillful means, they encourage them to persevere physically and mentally,

original: rigs kyi bu dag /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag /
translated: saying, ‘Sons of enlightened heritage!

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni /
translated: In the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos gang yang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: chos gang yang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am /
translated: no phenomenon whatsoever is discouraged or lazy.

original: gang la zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am /🔽gang gis zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: gang la zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am / gang gis zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am /
translated: There is nothing whatsoever that is slack or lazy,🔽nothing that is slack or lazy,

original: gang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de /
analyzed: gang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de /
translated: and nothing that is slack or lazy.

original: chos de dag ni /
analyzed: chos de dag ni /
translated: All these phenomena

original: thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid las mi 'da' ba yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid las mi 'da' ba yin gyi /
translated: are not beyond emptiness by nature.

original: lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed la /
analyzed: lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed la /
translated: Therefore, you should arouse physical and mental diligence,

original: le lo bor te dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: le lo bor te dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'am /
translated: cast aside laziness, and practice virtuous qualities,🔽such as generosity,

original: tshul khrims sam /
analyzed: tshul khrims sam /
translated: discipline,

original: bzod pa'am / @134a *//
analyzed: bzod pa'am / @134a *//
translated: patience,

original: brtson 'grus sam /
analyzed: brtson 'grus sam /
translated: diligence,

original: bsam gtan nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan nam /
translated: meditative concentration,

original: shes rab bam /🔽nang stong pa nyid dam /🔽phyi stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: shes rab bam / nang stong pa nyid dam / phyi stong pa nyid dam /
translated: and wisdom,🔽or inner emptiness,🔽outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dam /
translated: inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid dam /🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dam / don dam pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: great emptiness,🔽ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam /
translated: emptiness of the conditioned,🔽emptiness of the unconditioned,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: and emptiness beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness that is neither diminished nor abandoned,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of defining attributes,🔽the emptiness of nonobservation,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of nonentities,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
translated: the supports for miraculous ability,

original: dbang po rnams sam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams sam /

original: stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
translated: the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
translated: and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam /
translated: It is the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams sam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /
translated: the meditative stabilities,

original: tshad med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sam /
translated: the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the formless meditative absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the formless absorptions,

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams sam /
translated: the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin @134b rnams sam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin @134b rnams sam /
translated: the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam / byams pa chen po'am /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽great love,

original: snying rje chen po'am /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'am /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson par gyis shig /

original: rigs kyi bu dag /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag /
translated: “Noble sons,

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag thams cad sgrib pa med par rtogs shig /
translated: realize that all those dharmas are empty, and that they are not obscured.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang med do //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang med do //
translated: There is nothing at all that is an obscured dharma that is subject to shrinking.

original: zhes rab 'byor /
analyzed: zhes rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par ston to //🔽yang dag par skul lo //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par ston to // yang dag par skul lo //
translated: Thus, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, with skillful means they teach sentient beings the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽They encourage them.

original: yang dag par gzeng bstod do //
analyzed: yang dag par gzeng bstod do //
translated: They praise them.

original: yang dag par dga' bar byed do //
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar byed do //
translated: They delight them.🔽They establish them.

original: gzhog go / 'dul lo rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: gzhog go / 'dul lo rab tu 'god do //
translated: They tame them. They fully establish them.

original: ci nas kyang gnyis la mi gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang gnyis la mi gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'god do //
translated: They fully establish them in such a way that they do not abide in duality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /🔽gnyis su med de /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni / gnyis su med de /
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature🔽is nondual.

original: gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med do //
translated: It is not made into two.

original: gnyis su byar med pa'i chos ni /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med pa'i chos ni /
translated: A nondual phenomenon

original: gang la'ang gnas pa med do //
analyzed: gang la'ang gnas pa med do //
translated: does not abide anywhere at all.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'dems shing rjes su ston te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'dems shing rjes su ston te /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they skillfully encourage and teach sentient beings to be diligent in the emptiness of inherent nature.

analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Come here, son of a good family!

analyzed: sbyin pa'am / tshul khrims sam /

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dam /

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam /

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam /

analyzed: yongs su smin par byas nas rim gyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do //

analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do //

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do // dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do //

original: rang byang chub la 'god do //
analyzed: rang byang chub la 'god do //
translated: establish them in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'god do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'god do //
translated: establish them in the knowledge of path aspects,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do //
translated: and establish them in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can sems g-yeng ba rnams la 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can sems g-yeng ba rnams la 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom skillfully instruct and teach those sentient beings whose minds are distracted, saying,

original: tshur rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‘Come here, son of a good family!

original: ting @136a *// nge 'dzin sgoms shig /🔽g-yeng ba'i 'du shes sam /
analyzed: ting @136a *// nge 'dzin sgoms shig / g-yeng ba'i 'du shes sam /
translated: Meditate on meditative stabilization!🔽Don’t make the notion of distraction or

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes su ma byed cig /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes su ma byed cig /
translated: the notion of meditative stabilization!

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽chos de dag ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / chos de dag ni /
translated: Why is that?

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
translated: These dharmas are empty of a basic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni /🔽gang g-yeng ba'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni / gang g-yeng ba'am /
translated: In the emptiness of a basic nature

original: rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do //
translated: there is no dharma whatsoever that can be apprehended that is distracted or🔽that is one-pointed.

original: khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de la gnas te rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad na; lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i chos gang ci byed kyang rung ste /
analyzed: khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de la gnas te rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad na; lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i chos gang ci byed kyang rung ste /
translated: When you have practiced in the emptiness of a basic nature, abiding in that meditative stabilization, whatever wholesome dharmas you practice with body, speech, or mind,

original: sbyin pa gtong ngam /
analyzed: sbyin pa gtong ngam /
translated: whether you give gifts,

original: tshul khrims srung ngam /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung ngam /
translated: or guard morality,

original: bzod pa sgrub pa'am /
analyzed: bzod pa sgrub pa'am /
translated: or to cultivate patience,

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am /
translated: or to make an effort at perseverance,

original: ting nge 'dzin bskyed dam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin bskyed dam /
translated: or to develop concentration,

original: shes rab bsgom mam /🔽nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: shes rab bsgom mam / nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to cultivate wisdom,🔽or to practice inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la spyod dam /🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la spyod dam / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice great emptiness,🔽or to practice ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice conditioned emptiness,🔽or to practice unconditioned emptiness,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽or to practice the emptiness of what is without beginning or end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice the emptiness of what is not to be discarded,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: or to practice the emptiness of defining characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the emptiness of nonobservation?

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the emptiness of nonthings?

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the emptiness of intrinsic nature?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo @136b nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo @136b nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of nonthings?

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the applications of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the right efforts?

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the legs of miraculous power?

original: dbang po rnams la spyod dam; stobs rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams la spyod dam; stobs rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the faculties? Are you practicing the powers?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the branches of awakening?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod dam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the noble eightfold path?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the noble truths?

original: bsam gtan rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the concentrations?

original: tshad med pa rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the immeasurables?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the formless absorptions?

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod dam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the eight deliverances?

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod dam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the nine serial absorptions?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod dam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are the gateways to liberation?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the kinds of preternatural knowledge?

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the meditative stabilizations?

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod dam /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the dhāraṇī gateways?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod dam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the ten powers of the tathāgatas?

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod dam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the four fearlessnesses?🔽Are you practicing the four detailed and thorough knowledges?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod dam; byams pa chen po la spyod dam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod dam; byams pa chen po la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing great love?

original: snying rje chen po la spyod dam /🔽dga' ba chen po la spyod dam /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la spyod dam / dga' ba chen po la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing great compassion?🔽Are you practicing great joy?

original: btang snyoms chen po la spyod dam /
analyzed: btang snyoms chen po la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing great equanimity?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod dam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the thirty-two major marks of a great person?

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod dam /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the eighty minor marks?

original: nyan thos kyi lam la spyod dam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam la spyod dam /
translated: Are you practicing the śrāvaka path?

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam /
translated: “Do you practice the path of a pratyekabuddha?

original: byang @137a *// chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod dam /
analyzed: byang @137a *// chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod dam /
translated: Do you practice the path of a bodhisattva?

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod dam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod dam /
translated: Do you practice the path of a buddha?🔽Do you practice the result of stream enterer?

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam /
translated: Do you practice the result of once-returner?

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: Do you practice the result of non-returner?🔽Do you practice the state of a worthy one?

original: rang byang chub la spyod dam /
analyzed: rang byang chub la spyod dam /
translated: Do you practice a pratyekabuddha’s awakening?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod dam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod dam /
translated: Do you practice the knowledge of all aspects?

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spyod dam /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spyod dam /
translated: Do you practice bringing beings to maturity?

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la spyod kyang rung ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la spyod kyang rung ste /
translated: Do you practice purifying a buddhafield?

original: dge ba'i chos de dag la sgron chung dus 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos de dag la sgron chung dus 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: You will accomplish those wholesome dharmas with a small amount of hardship.”

original: zhes 'doms shing rjes su ston te /
analyzed: zhes 'doms shing rjes su ston te /
translated: They instruct and teach them like that.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de /
translated: Subhuti, in this way, when the Bodhisattva-mahāsattva practices the perfection of wisdom, with skillful means he benefits sentient beings.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas bar 'ga' yang las mi byed par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas bar 'ga' yang las mi byed par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: From the first production of the thought of enlightenment onward, he never fails to do good.

original: dge ba thams cad tshol zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed de /
analyzed: dge ba thams cad tshol zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed de /
translated: He seeks all wholesome states and benefits sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsnyen bkur byed cing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsnyen bkur byed cing /
translated: He always and constantly serves the Buddha Bhagavāns.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
translated: He goes from buddhafield to buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs rjes kyang nam du'ang rnam par chud mi za ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs rjes kyang nam du'ang rnam par chud mi za ste /
translated: The Dharma he hears from those Buddha Bhagavāns is never lost until he attains supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzungs @137b thob cing /
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzungs @137b thob cing /
translated: They will always and constantly attain dhāraṇīs,

original: lus kyi dbang po'am /🔽ngag gi dbang po'am /
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po'am / ngag gi dbang po'am /
translated: and they will not lose their physical faculties,🔽their verbal faculties,

original: yid kyi dbang po mi nyams pa yin /🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po mi nyams pa yin / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: or their mental faculties.🔽If you ask why, it is because those bodhisattva great beings, by constantly and always cultivating the knowledge of all aspects, have cultivated the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pa des lam thams cad shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pa des lam thams cad shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te /
translated: Through that cultivation of the knowledge of all aspects, they have cultivated all paths,

original: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
translated: whether the śrāvaka path,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
translated: the pratyekabuddha path,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam mam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam mam /
translated: the bodhisattva path,

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam shin tu bsgom par 'gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam shin tu bsgom par 'gyur /
translated: or the buddha path.

original: mngon par shes pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chud mi za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chud mi za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te /
translated: They have also cultivated the kinds of superknowledges that will be helpful to bodhisattva great beings by way of not losing anything.

original: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed na /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed na /
translated: And if, standing in those superknowledges that have arisen out of the evolution of his actions, he works the weal of beings,

original: 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'khor yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang yongs su mi nyams so //
analyzed: 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'khor yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang yongs su mi nyams so //
translated: he does not even then fall away from the knowledge of all modes.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing sems can shes rab 'chal pa can blo @138a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do // rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing sems can shes rab 'chal pa can blo @138a *//
translated: Thus, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, coursing in the perfection of wisdom, standing in the emptiness of inherent nature, through skill in means works the weal of beings.

original: chung ba rnams mthong na /
analyzed: chung ba rnams mthong na /
translated: Moreover, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, coursing in the perfection of wisdom, standing in the emptiness of inherent nature, when he sees beings who are of little intelligence, who are lacking in intelligence,

original: 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te /
translated: he exhorts and instructs them thus:

original: tshur rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu /
translated: 'Come here, son of good family!

original: lus dang / ngag gam /
analyzed: lus dang / ngag gam /
translated: body,🔽speech,🔽

original: yid kyi las gang ci byed kyang rung ste /
analyzed: yid kyi las gang ci byed kyang rung ste /
translated: Whatever actions you do, whether physical, verbal, or mental,🔽you should understand that they are all empty of essence.

original: de thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtogs shig dang / khyod kyi las thams cad bdud rtsi'i 'bras bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: de thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtogs shig dang / khyod kyi las thams cad bdud rtsi'i 'bras bur 'gyur te /
translated: Then all your actions will have the fruit of nectar,

original: mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur ro //
translated: and in the end you will become nectar.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni /🔽gang 'jig par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni / gang 'jig par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: In emptiness of essence🔽no phenomenon whatsoever can be apprehended

original: yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do //
translated: that would be destroyed or that would deteriorate.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Because the emptiness of essence

original: yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur /
translated: does not deteriorate.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa'i chos kyang gang yang med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa'i chos kyang gang yang med do //
translated: There is no phenomenon whatsoever that would deteriorate from the emptiness of essence.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni /🔽dngos po yod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni / dngos po yod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Because the emptiness of essence🔽is not a thing

original: dngos po med pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'ang ma yin /
translated: and is not a non-thing.

original: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ci zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhes rab 'byor /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ci zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhes rab 'byor /
translated: What is it that is lost in the intrinsic reality of the unreality of all things?”

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed de //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed de //
translated: Thus, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they skillfully instruct and teach sentient beings.

original: rang bzhin gyis ston pa nyid la 'jud par byed do //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ston pa nyid la 'jud par byed do //
translated: They cause them to enter into the natural teaching.

original: de ltar 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ston pa nyid la 'dzud pa'i tshe nam yang rjes su ma bsgrubs pa ma yin /
analyzed: de ltar 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ston pa nyid la 'dzud pa'i tshe nam yang rjes su ma bsgrubs pa ma yin /
translated: When they instruct and teach in this way and cause them to enter into the natural teaching, they never fail to accomplish their goal.

original: de ni / bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin //
analyzed: de ni / bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin //
translated: They themselves take up and maintain the path of the ten virtuous actions.

original: gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang @138b dag par skul ba yin /

analyzed: gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They are also encouraging others to attain the four fearlessnesses.

original: bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
translated: They are training in the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la @141b yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la @141b yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They are also encouraging others to attain the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: bdag kyang byams pa chen po la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang byams pa chen po la slob pa yin /
translated: They are training in great love.

original: gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They are also encouraging others to attain great love.

original: bdag kyang snying rje chen po la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang snying rje chen po la slob pa yin /
translated: They are training in great compassion.

original: gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to have great compassion.

original: bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin /
translated: They themselves train in the eighteen distinctive qualities of the buddhas.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to have the eighteen distinctive qualities of the buddhas.

original: bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la slob pa yin /
translated: They themselves train in the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to have the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la slob pa yin /
translated: They themselves train in the eighty minor marks.

original: gzhan yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to have the eighty minor marks.

original: bdag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
translated: They themselves give rise to the knowledge of the fruit of stream enterer but do not rest in that.

original: gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin /
translated: They establish others in the fruit of stream enterer.

original: bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
translated: I will give rise to the knowledge of the result of once-returner and not abide in it.

original: gzhan yan lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yan lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin /
translated: I will establish others in the result of once-returner.

original: bdag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
translated: I will give rise to the knowledge of the result of nonreturner and not abide in it.

original: gzhan yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin /
translated: I will establish others in the result of nonreturner.

original: bdag kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
translated: I will give rise to the knowledge of the result of arhat and not abide in it.

original: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god pa yin /🔽bdag kyang rang byang @142a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god pa yin / bdag kyang rang byang @142a *//
translated: I will establish others in the state of arhat.🔽I will give rise to the knowledge of pratyekabuddha

original: chub kyi shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
analyzed: chub kyi shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin /
translated: and not abide in it.

original: gzhan yang rang byang chub la 'god pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang rang byang chub la 'god pa yin /
translated: I will establish others in pratyekabuddhahood.

original: bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed pa yin /
translated: I will give rise to the path of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gzhan yang lam de la 'dems shing rjes su ston pa dang / gzhog cing 'dul ba dang 'god pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang lam de la 'dems shing rjes su ston pa dang / gzhog cing 'dul ba dang 'god pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, he selects, teaches, establishes, and trains in that path.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i tshe nam yang las
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i tshe nam yang las
translated: Subhūti, in that way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, from the time when they first begin setting their mind on enlightenment until they are seated at the site of awakening, they abide in the emptiness of inherent nature and, while working for the welfare of sentient beings,

original: med par gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med par gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: they never remain in a state of inactivity.🔽”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: gal te de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na /
translated: if all phenomena are empty of inherent nature,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni; sems can yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni; sems can yang mi dmigs /
translated: in the emptiness of inherent nature, sentient beings are not apprehended,

original: chos kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: chos kyang mi dmigs /
translated: phenomena are not apprehended,

original: chos ma lags pa'ang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: chos ma lags pa'ang mi dmigs na /
translated: and non-phenomena are not apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du yang dag par 'jug pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du yang dag par 'jug pa lags /
translated: How do bodhisattva great beings correctly engage for the sake of the knowledge of all aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te /

original: ji skad du smras pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa bzhin no //
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: All phenomena

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
translated: are empty of a basic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni /
translated: In the emptiness of a basic nature

original: sems can mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs so //
translated: sentient beings are not apprehended.

original: chos mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos mi dmigs so //

original: chos ma yin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Non-dharmas are not apprehended.

original: @142b rab 'byor /
analyzed: @142b rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

analyzed: gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni /
translated: if all phenomena were not empty of a basic nature,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur te /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong par mi ston to //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //

original: par 'gyur na /
analyzed: par 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, the emptiness of an intrinsic nature would be destroyed.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
translated: But the emptiness of an intrinsic nature

original: 'jig par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'jig par mi 'gyur /
translated: is not destroyed.

original: rtag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not permanent.

original: phyis med par 'gro ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: phyis med par 'gro ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: It does not go away later.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni / yul na mi gnas /
analyzed: de ni / yul na mi gnas /
translated: It does not exist in a place.

original: phyogs na mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: phyogs na mi gnas pa ste /
translated: It does not exist in a direction.

original: de ni / gang nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin /
analyzed: de ni / gang nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin /
translated: It does not come from anywhere.

original: gang du 'gro ba'ang ma yin te /
analyzed: gang du 'gro ba'ang ma yin te /
translated: It does not go anywhere.

original: de ni / chos gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni / chos gnas pa nyid do //
translated: That is the true nature of phenomena.

original: de la ni /🔽chos gang yang 'phel ba dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: de la ni / chos gang yang 'phel ba dmigs pa'am /
translated: In that, no phenomenon is seen

original: 'grib pa dmigs pa'am /🔽'gog pa dmigs pa'am /🔽skye ba dmigs pa'am /🔽'byung ba dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: 'grib pa dmigs pa'am / 'gog pa dmigs pa'am / skye ba dmigs pa'am / 'byung ba dmigs pa'am /
translated: to increase or decrease,🔽to cease or arise,🔽to come or go,

original: 'gag pa dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: 'gag pa dmigs pa'am /
translated: to be produced or to cease,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs pa'am /
translated: to be defiled or purified.

original: rnam par byang ba dmigs pa med do /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba dmigs pa med do /
translated: There is no object of purification.

original: de ni / chos rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de ni / chos rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: This is the nature of phenomena.

original: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste /🔽chos gang yang 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste / chos gang yang 'jug pa'am /
translated: Abiding in this, bodhisattva great beings enter into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mi 'jug par mthong ba med do //
analyzed: mi 'jug par mthong ba med do //
translated: They do not see any phenomenon that is engaged or not engaged.

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: All phenomena

original: 'jug pa med cing gnas pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa med cing gnas pa med pa ste /
translated: are not engaged and do not abide.

original: de ni / chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de ni / chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the abiding of phenomena.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom see all phenomena as empty of inherent existence, they do not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni / 'di ltar 'dis sgrib pa'i chos gang yang yang @148b dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'dis sgrib pa'i chos gang yang yang @148b dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: It is because they do not see any phenomenon that obscures.

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: They see all phenomena

original: sgrib pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgrib pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: as being without obscurations.

original: de ni / 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bdag mi dmigs /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bdag mi dmigs /
translated: It is because they do not apprehend a self in the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: bdag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: bdag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the designation of a self;

original: sems can mi dmigs /
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a sentient being,

original: sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the designation of a sentient being;

original: srog mi dmigs /
analyzed: srog mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a living being,

original: srog tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽'gro ba'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: srog tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / 'gro ba'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the designation of a living being;🔽they do not apprehend a creature,

original: 'gro bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽gso ba'ang mi dmigs /🔽gso bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'gro bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / gso ba'ang mi dmigs / gso bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the designation of a creature;

original: skyes bu'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: skyes bu'ang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a person,

original: skyes bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: skyes bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the designation of a person;

original: gang zag kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gang zag kyang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend an individual,

original: gang zag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽shed can yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gang zag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / shed can yang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the designation of an individual;🔽they do not apprehend one who feels,

original: shed can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽shed bdag kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: shed can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / shed bdag kyang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the designation of one who feels;🔽they do not apprehend one who knows,

original: shed bdag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: shed bdag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the designation of one who knows;

original: byed pa po'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: byed pa po'ang mi dmigs /

translated: the emptiness of all things is non-apprehensible,🔽and the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is non-apprehensible.🔽“The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
translated: and the designation of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is also non-apprehensible.🔽The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible,🔽and the designation of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is also non-apprehensible.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽rang bzhin @151b stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / rang bzhin @151b stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is non-apprehensible,🔽and the designation of the emptiness of the unlimited is also non-apprehensible.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is non-apprehensible,🔽and the designation of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is also non-apprehensible.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is non-apprehensible,🔽and the designation of the emptiness of inherent existence is also non-apprehensible.🔽The emptiness of all things is non-apprehensible,🔽and the designation of the emptiness of all things is also non-apprehensible.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is non-apprehensible,🔽and the designation of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is also non-apprehensible.”

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics is non-apprehensible,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the designation of the emptiness of defining characteristics is non-apprehensible,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension is non-apprehensible,🔽the designation of the emptiness of non-apprehension is non-apprehensible,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the emptiness of non-entities is non-apprehensible,🔽the designation of the emptiness of non-entities is non-apprehensible,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is non-apprehensible,🔽the designation of the emptiness of essential nature is non-apprehensible,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is non-apprehensible,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the designation of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is non-apprehensible,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the designation of the applications of mindfulness is non-apprehensible,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the right efforts are non-apprehensible,

original: yang dag par spong bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: yang dag par spong bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the correct exertions are not found,🔽the bases of miraculous power are not found,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the bases of miraculous power as a designation are not found,🔽the faculties are not found,

original: dbang por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: dbang por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the faculties as a designation are not found,🔽the powers are not found,

original: stobs su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag tu gdags @152a *//
analyzed: stobs su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs / byang chub kyi yan lag tu gdags @152a *//
translated: the powers as a designation are not found,🔽the branches of awakening are not found,

original: pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: pa'ang mi dmigs / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the branches of awakening as a designation are not found,🔽the noble eightfold path is not found,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the noble eightfold path as a designation is not found,🔽the truths are not found,

original: 'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the truths as a designation are not found,🔽the concentrations are not found,

original: bsam gtan du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: bsam gtan du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the concentrations as a designation are not found,🔽the immeasurables are not found,

original: tshad med par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: tshad med par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the immeasurables as a designation are not found,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the formless absorptions are not apprehended,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the designation of the formless absorptions is not apprehended,🔽the deliverances are not apprehended,

original: rnam par thar par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rnam par thar par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the designation of the deliverances is not apprehended,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the serial absorptions are not apprehended,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the designation of the serial absorptions is not apprehended,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are not apprehended,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the designation of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation is not apprehended,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the kinds of perceptual domination are not apprehended,

original: mngon par shes par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: mngon par shes par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the designation of the kinds of perceptual domination is not apprehended,🔽the meditative stabilities are not apprehended,

original: ting nge 'dzin du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the designation of the meditative stabilities is not apprehended,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible,

original: gzungs kyi @152b sgor gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gzungs kyi @152b sgor gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: and the designation of the dhāraṇī gateways is also non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are non-apprehensible,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: and the designation of the powers of the tathāgatas is also non-apprehensible.🔽The fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible,

original: mi 'jigs par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: mi 'jigs par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: and the designation of the fearlessnesses is also non-apprehensible.🔽The detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible,

original: so so yang dag par rig par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽byams pa chen po'ang mi dmigs /🔽byams pa chen por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / byams pa chen po'ang mi dmigs / byams pa chen por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: and the designation of the detailed and thorough knowledges is also non-apprehensible.🔽Great love is non-apprehensible,🔽and the designation of great love is also non-apprehensible.

original: snying rje chen po'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang mi dmigs /
translated: Great compassion is non-apprehensible,

original: snying rje chen por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: snying rje chen por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs /
translated: and the designation of great compassion is also non-apprehensible.🔽The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are non-apprehensible,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa bco brgyad du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa bco brgyad du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: and the designation of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas is also non-apprehensible.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs /
translated: The result of stream enterer is non-apprehensible,🔽and the designation of the result of stream enterer is also non-apprehensible.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend the designation ‘result of stream enterer’;🔽they do not apprehend the result of once-returner;

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend the designation ‘result of once-returner’;🔽they do not apprehend the result of non-returner;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend the designation ‘result of non-returner’;🔽they do not apprehend the state of a worthy one;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽rang byang chub kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / rang byang chub kyang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend the designation ‘state of a worthy one’;🔽they do not apprehend a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: rang byang chub tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang byang chub tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend the designation ‘pratyekabuddha’s awakening’;🔽they do not apprehend the knowledge of path aspects;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend the designation ‘knowledge of path aspects’;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @153a *//🔽pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @153a *// pa nyid kyang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: they do not apprehend the designation ‘knowledge of all aspects.’

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang mi dmigs /
translated: They do not apprehend the thirty-two major marks of a great person;

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the thirty-two major marks of a great person are not apprehended,

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'ang mi dmigs /
translated: the eighty minor marks are not apprehended,

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs na /
translated: and the designation of the eighty minor marks is not apprehended,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom za bar 'gyur ba lta ga las 'ong /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom za bar 'gyur ba lta ga las 'ong /
translated: how could they have doubts about unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i dge slong ngam /🔽dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i dge slong ngam / dge slong ma'am /
translated: for example, a tathāgata has a monk,🔽or a nun,

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /
translated: or a male lay follower,

original: dge bsnyen ma la bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar rgyun du chos bstan na /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma la bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar rgyun du chos bstan na /
translated: or a female lay follower emanated for many hundreds of thousands of quintillions of eons continuously teaching the Dharma.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: What do you think, Subhūti?

original: sprul pa de dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba lta yod dam /
analyzed: sprul pa de dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba lta yod dam /
translated: Do those emanations have the fortune to attain the result of stream enterer?

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of once-returner?

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of non-returner?

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
translated: the state of a worthy one?

original: rang byang chub bam /
analyzed: rang byang chub bam /
translated: or to the pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba yod dam /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba yod dam /
translated: or to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Bhagavān,

original: de ni / ma lags te /
analyzed: de ni / ma lags te /
translated: it is not so.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na; 'di ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na; 'di ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis so //
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not have an intrinsic nature.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is so!

original: chos thams cad la dngos po med na /
analyzed: chos thams cad la dngos po med na /
translated: If all dharmas do not have an intrinsic nature,

original: @153b sems can gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: @153b sems can gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: what being will the bodhisattva great beings establish in the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid dam /🔽rang byang chub bam /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am / dgra bcom pa nyid dam / rang byang chub bam /
translated: the result of non-returner,🔽the state of a worthy one,🔽the state of a pratyekabuddha,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dgod par bya ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dgod par bya ste /
translated: or in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: gzhan du na phyin ci log gis yongs su 'khris pa'i skye dgu dag phyin ci log med pa la gzhog go /
analyzed: gzhan du na phyin ci log gis yongs su 'khris pa'i skye dgu dag phyin ci log med pa la gzhog go /
translated: Otherwise, he would be placing those who are completely entangled in error in the absence of error.

original: 'dul lo // rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: 'dul lo // rab tu 'god do //
translated: He would be disciplining them, he would be establishing them.

original: phyin ci log gang yin pa de'ang rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phyin ci log gang yin pa de'ang rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir /
translated: And that error also arises from the cause of conceptualization.

original: phyin ci log ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log ma yin pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is not non-error.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa ni /
translated: The absence of conceptualization

original: phyin ci log ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log ma yin pa'o //
translated: is non-error.

original: gang la phyin ci log med pa de la bdag med do //
analyzed: gang la phyin ci log med pa de la bdag med do //
translated: In that which is non-error, there is no self.

original: sems can med do //
analyzed: sems can med do //
translated: There are no sentient beings.

original: srog med do //
analyzed: srog med do //
translated: There is no life-force.

original: 'gro ba med do //🔽gso ba med do //🔽skyes bu med do //
analyzed: 'gro ba med do // gso ba med do // skyes bu med do //
translated: There is no person.🔽There is no human.

original: gang zag med do //🔽shed can med do //🔽shed bdag med do //
analyzed: gang zag med do // shed can med do // shed bdag med do //
translated: There is no human being.

original: byed pa po med do //
analyzed: byed pa po med do //
translated: There is no one who does.

original: tshor ba po med do //
analyzed: tshor ba po med do //
translated: There is no one who feels.

original: shes pa po med do //
analyzed: shes pa po med do //
translated: There is no one who knows.

original: mthong ba po med do //
analyzed: mthong ba po med do //
translated: There is no one who sees.

original: de la gzugs med do //
analyzed: de la gzugs med do //
translated: There is no form in that.

original: tshor ba med do //
analyzed: tshor ba med do //
translated: There is no feeling.

original: 'du shes med do //
analyzed: 'du shes med do //
translated: There is no perception.

original: 'du byed med do //
analyzed: 'du byed med do //
translated: There is no formation.

original: rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: There is no consciousness.

original: de la mig med do //🔽rna ba med do //
analyzed: de la mig med do // rna ba med do //
translated: There are no eyes in that.🔽There are no ears.

original: sna med do //
analyzed: sna med do //
translated: There is no nose.

original: lce med do //
analyzed: lce med do //
translated: There is no tongue.

original: lus med do //
analyzed: lus med do //
translated: There is no body.

original: yid med do //
analyzed: yid med do //
translated: There is no mind.

original: de la gzugs med do //
analyzed: de la gzugs med do //
translated: There is no form.

original: sgra med do //
analyzed: sgra med do //
translated: There is no sound.

original: dri med do //
analyzed: dri med do //
translated: There is no smell.🔽There is no taste.

original: ro med do; ;reg med do //
analyzed: ro med do; ;reg med do //
translated: There is no texture.

original: chos med do //
analyzed: chos med do //
translated: There are no mental phenomena.

original: de la mig gi rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: de la mig gi rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: There is no eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa med do //

analyzed: 'du byed med do //

analyzed: tshor ba med do //

analyzed: sred pa med do //

analyzed: len pa med do // srid pa med do //

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid med do //
translated: “There is no emptiness of internal phenomena,

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid med do //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid med do //
translated: no emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽no emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do //
translated: no emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,
