analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do //
translated: no emptiness of the unlimited,🔽no emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do //
translated: no emptiness of non-dispersal,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do //
translated: no emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do //
translated: and no emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do //
translated: There is no emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do //
translated: and no emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do //
analyzed: de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do //
translated: “In it there are no applications of mindfulness,

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams med do; ;rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med do //
translated: no right efforts, no legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams med do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams med do //
translated: no faculties,

original: stobs rnams med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams med do //
translated: no powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do //
translated: no branches of enlightenment,

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do //
translated: and no noble eightfold path.

original: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do //
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do //
translated: “In it there are no noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams med do //
translated: no concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams med do //
translated: no immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do //
translated: and no formless absorptions.

original: de la rnam par thar pa rnams med do //
analyzed: de la rnam par thar pa rnams med do //
translated: “In it there are no deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do //
translated: no stages of meditative absorption,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do //🔽mngon par @155a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do // mngon par @155a *//
translated: the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation do not exist.

original: shes pa rnams med do //
analyzed: shes pa rnams med do //
translated: the clairvoyances do not exist.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams med do //
translated: the meditative stabilities do not exist.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways do not exist.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do //
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas do not exist.🔽the four fearlessnesses do not exist.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams med do; ;so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams med do; ;so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med do //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges do not exist.

original: byams pa chen po med do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po med do //
translated: great love does not exist.

original: snying rje chen po med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po med do //
translated: great compassion does not exist.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist.

original: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: the result of stream enterer does not exist.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: the result of once-returner does not exist.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: the result of non-returner does not exist.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid med do //
translated: the state of a worthy one does not exist.

original: rang byang chub med do //
analyzed: rang byang chub med do //
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening does not exist.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid med do //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid med do //
translated: a knower of all aspects does not exist.

original: de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do //
analyzed: de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do //
translated: the knowledge of the path with its aspects does not exist.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects does not exist.🔽The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya gya drug pa //🔽gang la gzugs med pa dang / tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / gang la mig med pa dang / rna ba med pa dang / sna med pa dang /
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya gya drug pa // gang la gzugs med pa dang / tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / gang la mig med pa dang / rna ba med pa dang / sna med pa dang /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in Two Hundred Thousand Lines🔽Where there is no form, no feeling, no perception, no volitional factors, and no consciousness; where there is no eye, no ear, no nose,🔽no tongue, no body, no mind; where there is no form, no sound, no smell,

original: lce med pa dang / lus med pa dang / yid med pa dang / gang la gzugs med pa dang / sgra med pa dang / dri med pa dang / ro med pa dang / reg med pa dang / chos med pa dang / gang la mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa dang /
analyzed: lce med pa dang / lus med pa dang / yid med pa dang / gang la gzugs med pa dang / sgra med pa dang / dri med pa dang / ro med pa dang / reg med pa dang / chos med pa dang / gang la mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa dang /
translated: no taste, no texture, no mental object; where there is no eye constituent up to no mind constituent, no form constituent up to no mental object constituent, no eye-consciousness constituent up to no mind-consciousness constituent;

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lus kyi rnam @155b par shes pa med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang /🔽gang la mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lus kyi rnam @155b par shes pa med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang / gang la mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /
translated: It is the nonexistence of the ear consciousness, the nonexistence of the nose consciousness, the nonexistence of the tongue consciousness, the nonexistence of the body consciousness, and the nonexistence of the mind consciousness.🔽It is the nonexistence of eye contact, the nonexistence of ear contact, the nonexistence of nose contact, the nonexistence of tongue contact, the nonexistence of body contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / gang la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / gang la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /
translated: and the nonexistence of mind contact. It is the nonexistence of the sensation that arises from the condition of eye contact, the nonexistence of the sensation that arises from the condition of ear contact, the nonexistence of the sensation that arises from the condition of nose contact,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / gang la sa'i khams med pa dang /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / gang la sa'i khams med pa dang /
translated: It is the nonexistence of the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue, tastes, and the consciousness of the tongue. It is the nonexistence of the condition of contact through the coming together of the body, tangibles, and the consciousness of the body. It is the nonexistence of the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind, mental phenomena, and the mind consciousness. It is the nonexistence of the earth element,

original: chu'i khams med pa dang / me'i khams med pa dang / rlung gi khams med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa dang / gang la ma rig pa med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang /
analyzed: chu'i khams med pa dang / me'i khams med pa dang / rlung gi khams med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa dang / gang la ma rig pa med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang /
translated: the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element. It is the nonexistence of ignorance,

original: rnam par shes pa med pa dang / ming dang gzugs med pa dang / skye mched drug med pa dang / reg pa med pa dang / tshor ba med pa dang / sred pa med pa dang / len pa med pa dang / srid pa med pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa dang / ming dang gzugs med pa dang / skye mched drug med pa dang / reg pa med pa dang / tshor ba med pa dang / sred pa med pa dang / len pa med pa dang / srid pa med pa dang /
translated: the nonexistence of formative predispositions, the nonexistence of consciousness, the nonexistence of name and form, the nonexistence of the six sense fields, the nonexistence of contact, the nonexistence of sensation, the nonexistence of craving, the nonexistence of grasping, the nonexistence of becoming,🔽and the nonexistence of birth.

original: skye ba med pa dang / rga shi med pa dang / gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang / rga shi med pa dang / gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /
translated: the absence of birth, the absence of aging and death, the absence of the perfection of generosity, the absence of the perfection of discipline, the absence of the perfection of patience, the absence of the perfection of diligence,

original: bsam @156a *// gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / gang la nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /
analyzed: bsam @156a *// gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / gang la nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /
translated: the absence of the perfection of concentration, the absence of the perfection of wisdom, the absence of inner emptiness, the absence of outer emptiness, the absence of inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /
translated: the absence of the emptiness of emptiness, the absence of great emptiness, the absence of ultimate emptiness, the absence of the emptiness of the conditioned, the absence of the emptiness of the unconditioned, the absence of the emptiness beyond extremes,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang /
translated: the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an initial beginning and the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an end; the emptiness that is the nonexistence of discarding; the emptiness that is the nonexistence of a nature; the emptiness that is the nonexistence of all phenomena; the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic defining characteristic;

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa dang /
translated: the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an apprehensible; the emptiness that is the nonexistence of a non-existent thing; the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an essential nature; the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an essential nature of non-existent things; the nonexistence of the applications of mindfulness;

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med pa dang / dbang po rnams med pa dang / stobs rnams med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med pa dang / dbang po rnams med pa dang / stobs rnams med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa dang /
translated: the nonexistence of the correct exertions; the nonexistence of the supports for miraculous abilities; the nonexistence of the faculties; the nonexistence of the powers; the nonexistence of the branches of enlightenment; the nonexistence of the noble eightfold path;

original: gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams med pa dang / tshad med pa rnams med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par @156b 'jug pa rnams med pa dang / gang la rnam par thar pa rnams med pa dang /
analyzed: gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams med pa dang / tshad med pa rnams med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par @156b 'jug pa rnams med pa dang / gang la rnam par thar pa rnams med pa dang /
translated: where the noble truths do not exist, where the meditative stabilities do not exist, where the immeasurable aspirations do not exist, where the formless absorptions do not exist, where the deliverances do not exist,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams med pa dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams med pa dang /
translated: where the nine serial steps of meditative absorption do not exist, where the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are the gateways to liberation do not exist, where the clairvoyances do not exist, where the meditative stabilizations do not exist,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams med pa dang / gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med pa dang / byams pa chen po med pa dang / snying rje chen po med pa dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams med pa dang / gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med pa dang / byams pa chen po med pa dang / snying rje chen po med pa dang /
translated: where the dhāraṇī gateways do not exist, where the powers of the tathāgatas do not exist, where the fearlessnesses do not exist, where the detailed and thorough knowledges do not exist, where great love does not exist, where great compassion does not exist,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med pa dang / gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid med pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med pa dang / gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid med pa dang /
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist, the result of stream enterer does not exist, the result of once-returner does not exist, the result of non-returner does not exist, the state of a worthy one does not exist,

original: rang byang chub med pa dang / gang la thams cad shes pa nyid med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med pa de ni /
analyzed: rang byang chub med pa dang / gang la thams cad shes pa nyid med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med pa de ni /
translated: the state of a pratyekabuddha does not exist, the state of knowing all things does not exist, the state of knowing the paths does not exist, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening does not exist.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid de /
translated: That is the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings standing in that practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams sems can gyi 'du shes las 'grel te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams sems can gyi 'du shes las 'grel te /
translated: Practicing the perfection of wisdom, they liberate beings who have gone wrong from the perception of beings.

original: gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'grel te //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'grel te //
translated: They liberate them from the perception of form.

original: gzugs med pa'i 'du shes las @157a *//
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i 'du shes las @157a *//
translated: from the perception of the formless realm,

original: 'grel to // zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar las 'grel to //
analyzed: 'grel to // zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar las 'grel to //
translated: up to from all dharmas with outflows.

original: gang zag pa med pa'i chos 'di lta ste /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: gang zag pa med pa'i chos 'di lta ste / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: The uncontaminated dharmas are:🔽the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of supernatural power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of awakening, the eightfold noble path,

original: rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
translated: the three doors of liberation, the four noble truths, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang de la don dam pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de lta bu ma yin te /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang de la don dam pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de lta bu ma yin te /
translated: The four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen unshared attributes of a buddha are not ultimate in the way that they are ultimate in that [ultimate].

original: 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa 'di ni /
translated: Thus, uncompounded, unarisen, insubstantial, and non-occurring

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: is the emptiness of nature.

original: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste /
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste /
translated: That is the enlightenment of the Blessed Buddhas.

original: de la bdag med do //
analyzed: de la bdag med do //
translated: In that [enlightenment], there is no self.

original: sems can med do //🔽srog med do //
analyzed: sems can med do // srog med do //

analyzed: skye ba po med do // gso ba bo med do // skyes bu med do //

analyzed: gang zag med do // shed can med do // shed bdag med do //

analyzed: byed pa po med do //

analyzed: tshor ba po med do //

analyzed: shes pa po med do //

analyzed: @157b mthong ba po med do //

analyzed: gzugs med do //

original: tshor ba med do //
analyzed: tshor ba med do //

analyzed: 'du shes med do //

analyzed: 'du byed med do //

original: rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med do //

analyzed: mig med do //

analyzed: rna ba med do // sna med do //

original: gzugs med do //
analyzed: gzugs med do //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do; ;sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do //

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
translated: There is no feeling conditioned by the sensory contact of the mind.

original: sa'i khams med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams med do //

analyzed: chu'i khams med do //

analyzed: me'i khams med do // rlung gi khams med do //
translated: There is no fire element.🔽There is no wind element.

analyzed: nam mkha'i khams med do //
translated: There is no space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
translated: There is no consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa med do //
translated: There is no ignorance.

original: 'du byed med do //
analyzed: 'du byed med do //
translated: There are no formative predispositions.

original: rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: There is no consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs med do //
translated: There is no name and form.

original: skye mched drug med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug med do //
translated: There are no six sense fields.

original: reg pa med @158a *//
analyzed: reg pa med @158a *//

analyzed: do; ;tshor ba med do //
translated: There is no sensation.

original: sred pa med do //
analyzed: sred pa med do //
translated: There is no craving.

original: len pa med do //
analyzed: len pa med do //
translated: There is no appropriation.

original: srid pa med do //
analyzed: srid pa med do //
translated: There is no existence.

original: skye ba med do //
analyzed: skye ba med do //
translated: There is no birth.

original: rga shi med do //
analyzed: rga shi med do //
translated: There is no old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: There is no perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: the perfection of morality does not exist,🔽the perfection of patience does not exist,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: the perfection of perseverance does not exist,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: the perfection of concentration does not exist,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med de //🔽nang stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med de // nang stong pa nyid med do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom does not exist.🔽Inner emptiness does not exist.

original: phyi stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid med do //
translated: Outer emptiness does not exist.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid med do //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness does not exist.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness does not exist.

original: chen po stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid med do //
translated: Great emptiness does not exist.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid med do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality does not exist.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena does not exist.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena does not exist.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes does not exist.🔽The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless does not exist.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection does not exist.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence does not exist.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena does not exist.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do //
translated: “The emptiness of defining characteristics does not exist.🔽“The emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //
translated: “The emptiness of non-entities does not exist.🔽“The emptiness of essential nature does not exist.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //
translated: “The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities does not exist.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do //
translated: “The applications of mindfulness do not exist.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams med do //
translated: “The right efforts do not exist.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med do //🔽dbang po rnams med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med do // dbang po rnams med do //
translated: “The legs of miraculous power do not exist.🔽“The faculties do not exist.

original: stobs rnams med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams med do //
translated: “The powers do not exist.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do //
translated: “The branches of enlightenment do not exist.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do //
translated: “The noble eightfold path does not exist.

original: 'phags @158b pa'i bden pa rnams med do //
analyzed: 'phags @158b pa'i bden pa rnams med do //
translated: “The noble truths do not exist.

original: bsam gtan rnams med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams med do //
translated: “The meditative stabilities do not exist.

original: tshad med pa rnams med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams med do //
translated: “The immeasurable aspirations do not exist.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do //
translated: “The formless meditative stabilizations do not exist.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad med do //
translated: “The eight deliverances do not exist.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do //
translated: “The nine serial steps of meditative absorption do not exist.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do //
translated: The wishless gate of liberation does not exist.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams med do //
translated: “The superknowledges do not exist.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams med do //
translated: The meditative stabilizations do not exist.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways do not exist.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do //
translated: “The powers of the tathāgatas do not exist.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams med do //
translated: The fearlessnesses do not exist.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi med do //🔽byams pa chen po med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi med do // byams pa chen po med do //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges do not exist.🔽Great love does not exist.

original: snying rje chen po med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po med do //
translated: Great compassion does not exist.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist.

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis med do //
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis med do //
translated: The thirty-two major marks of a great person do not exist.

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu med do //
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu med do //
translated: The eighty minor signs do not exist.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: “The result of stream enterer does not exist.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: The result of once-returner does not exist.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do //
translated: The result of non-returner does not exist.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid med do //
translated: The state of a worthy one does not exist.

original: rang byang chub med do //
analyzed: rang byang chub med do //
translated: Solitary awakening does not exist.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects does not exist.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do //
translated: There is no omniscience.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /🔽gzhan du na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni / gzhan du na /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva🔽does not enter into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening for the sake of the path.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las lam gyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa med de /🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'ang snga nas kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las lam gyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa med de / rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'ang snga nas kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of nature is not something that is made empty by the bodhisattva.🔽The emptiness of nature is empty by its very nature.

original: phyin chad kyang rang bzhin @159a *//🔽gyis stong pa nyid /
analyzed: phyin chad kyang rang bzhin @159a *// gyis stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of nature is empty by its very nature.

original: bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de /
translated: The emptiness of nature is empty by its very nature.

original: de nam yang rang bzhin gyis mi stong pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nam yang rang bzhin gyis mi stong pa ma yin no //
translated: It is never not empty by its very nature.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //🔽de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di lta ste /

translated: Having purified a buddhafield and having effected the stabilization of the life-force, he will fully awaken to unsurpassed, genuine and complete enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas kyi tshul rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rgyun mi gcod do //🔽de ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul te /

translated: Having fully awakened to unsurpassed, genuine and complete enlightenment, he will not cut off the continuity of the way of the buddhas, which is the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽That is the way of the buddhas, the bhagavats.

original: 'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste /

translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the body.🔽The mind is also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid do //🔽gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid do // gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the mind.🔽Form is also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //🔽sgra nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so // sgra nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also form.🔽Sound is also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also sound.

original: dri nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dri nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Smell itself is the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dri'o //🔽ro nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dri'o // ro nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also smell.🔽Taste itself is the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ro'o //🔽reg nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ro'o // reg nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also taste.🔽Touch itself is the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg go /🔽chos nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg go / chos nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also touch.🔽Phenomena themselves are the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos so //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos so // mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also phenomena.🔽Eye consciousness itself is the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The emptiness of inherent nature is also eye consciousness.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o; ;rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o; ;rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Ear consciousness itself is the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Nose consciousness itself is the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o // lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: the nose consciousness is emptiness of inherent nature, and🔽emptiness of inherent nature is the nose consciousness.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽lus kyi rnam @164a *//🔽par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o // lus kyi rnam @164a *// par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The tongue consciousness is emptiness of inherent nature, and🔽emptiness of inherent nature is the tongue consciousness.🔽The body consciousness is emptiness of inherent nature, and

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o // yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: emptiness of inherent nature is the body consciousness.🔽The mind consciousness is emptiness of inherent nature, and

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: emptiness of inherent nature is the mind consciousness.🔽Eye contact is emptiness of inherent nature, and

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: emptiness of inherent nature is eye contact.🔽Ear contact is emptiness of inherent nature, and

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: emptiness of inherent nature is ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The nose sense-sphere is empty of the nature of the nose sense-sphere.🔽The nature of emptiness is also the nose sense-sphere.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The tongue sense-sphere is empty of the nature of the tongue sense-sphere.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of emptiness is also the tongue sense-sphere.🔽The body sense-sphere is empty of the nature of the body sense-sphere.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of emptiness is also the body sense-sphere.🔽The mind sense-sphere is empty of the nature of the mind sense-sphere.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of emptiness is also the mind sense-sphere.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is empty of the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The nature of emptiness is also the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the ear is also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽sna'i 'dus @164b te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // sna'i 'dus @164b te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear.🔽The condition of contact through the coming together of the nose is also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose.🔽The condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue is also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue.🔽The condition of contact through the coming together of the body is also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the condition of contact through the coming together of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty, dharmas, and mental consciousness is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽sa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // sa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty, dharmas, and mental consciousness.🔽The earth element is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so //🔽chu'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so // chu'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the earth element.🔽The water element is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so //🔽me'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so // me'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the water element.🔽The fire element is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so //🔽rlung gi khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so // rlung gi khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the fire element.🔽The wind element is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //🔽nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so // nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the wind element.🔽The space element is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The consciousness element itself is emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //🔽ma rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin @165a *//🔽stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so // ma rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin @165a *// stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness of intrinsic nature itself is the consciousness element.🔽Ignorance itself is emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //🔽'du byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o // 'du byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness of intrinsic nature itself is ignorance.🔽Formations themselves are emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness of intrinsic nature itself is formations.🔽Consciousness itself is emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //🔽ming dang gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // ming dang gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness of intrinsic nature itself is consciousness.🔽Name and form themselves are emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //🔽skye mched drug nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so // skye mched drug nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness of intrinsic nature itself is name and form.🔽The six sense spheres themselves are emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go /
translated: Emptiness of intrinsic nature itself is the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Contact itself is empty of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o //🔽tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o // tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Empty of inherent nature, it is contact.🔽Sensation itself is empty of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //🔽sred pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o // sred pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Empty of inherent nature, it is sensation.🔽Craving itself is empty of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o //🔽len pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o // len pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Empty of inherent nature, it is craving.🔽Clinging itself is empty of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o //🔽srid pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o // srid pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Empty of inherent nature, it is clinging.🔽Becoming itself is empty of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o //🔽skye ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o // skye ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Empty of inherent nature, it is becoming.🔽Birth itself is empty of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o //🔽rga shi nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o // rga shi nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Empty of inherent nature, it is birth.🔽Aging and death itself is empty of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //
translated: Empty of inherent nature, it is aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of generosity itself is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang @165b bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang @165b bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence itself is the perfection of generosity.🔽The perfection of moral discipline itself is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence itself is the perfection of moral discipline.🔽The perfection of patience itself is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence itself is the perfection of patience.🔽The perfection of effort itself is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence itself is the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of meditation itself is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of meditative stability is also the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The perfection of wisdom is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also the perfection of wisdom.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of external phenomena is also the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do //🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of external and internal phenomena is also the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.🔽The emptiness of emptiness is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the great is also the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do // don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic nature is also the emptiness of the great.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate is also the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic nature is also the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin @166a *//🔽stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin @166a *// stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is also the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic nature is also the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is also the emptiness of intrinsic nature.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic nature is also the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is also the emptiness of intrinsic nature.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic nature is also the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of nonrejection is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of nonrejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of defining characteristics is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //🔽dngos po med  stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do // dngos po med  stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid @166b kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid @166b kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the emptiness of essential nature.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
