original: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The very right efforts are the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is the very right efforts.🔽The very bases of supernatural powers are the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //🔽dbang po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so // dbang po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is the very bases of supernatural powers.🔽The very faculties are the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //🔽stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so // stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is the very faculties.🔽The very powers are the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so // byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is the very powers.🔽The very limbs of awakening are the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is the very limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The very noble eightfold path is the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The eightfold noble path is also the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The four noble truths are also the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The emptiness of inherent nature is also the four noble truths.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so; ;bsam gtan nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so; ;bsam gtan nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The four formless concentrations are also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so //🔽tshad med pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang @167a *//
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so // tshad med pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang @167a *//
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the four formless concentrations.🔽The four immeasurables are also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: tshad med pa rnams so //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams so // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the four immeasurables.🔽The four formless absorptions are also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //🔽rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so // rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the four formless absorptions.🔽The eight deliverances are also the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so //
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is also the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: the meditative absorption of progressive abiding is also the emptiness of essential nature;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is also the meditative absorption of progressive abiding.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates to liberation are also the emptiness of essential nature;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //🔽mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o // mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is also the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates to liberation.🔽The superknowledges are also the emptiness of essential nature;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so //🔽ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so // ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is also the superknowledges.🔽The meditative stabilities are also the emptiness of essential nature;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is also the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are also the emptiness of essential nature;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The tathāgatas’ powers are also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //🔽mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so // mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the tathāgatas’ powers.🔽Fearlessness is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa @167b rnams so //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa @167b rnams so // so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also fearlessness.🔽Correct understanding is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //🔽byams pa chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so // byams pa chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also correct understanding.🔽Great love is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o //🔽snying rje chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o // snying rje chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also great love.🔽Great compassion is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha are also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha.🔽The result of stream enterer is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the result of stream enterer.🔽The result of once-returner is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the result of once-returner.🔽The result of non-returner is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o // dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the result of non-returner.🔽Arhatship is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also arhatship.

original: rang byang chub nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang byang chub nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: and a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is also the emptiness of a basic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang byang chub bo //🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang byang chub bo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of a basic nature is also a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.🔽The knowledge of path aspects is also the emptiness of a basic nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams @168a *//
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams @168a *//
translated: The emptiness of a basic nature is also the knowledge of path aspects.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of a basic nature.

original: cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of a basic nature is also the knowledge of all aspects.🔽’

original: zhes bgyi bar spyod pa ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: zhes bgyi bar spyod pa ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: “Subhūti, you have practiced this marvelously!”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te /
translated: “Exactly so, Subhūti, exactly so!

original: ji skad du smras pa bzhin te /🔽rab 'byor / gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa bzhin te / rab 'byor / gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: Subhūti, if form were one thing and the emptiness of a basic nature another,🔽if feeling were one thing and the emptiness of a basic nature another,

original: tshor ba'ang gzhan la /🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang gzhan la / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: if perception were one thing and the emptiness of a basic nature another,🔽if volitional factors were one thing and the emptiness of a basic nature another,

original: 'du shes kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: 'du shes kyang gzhan la /
translated: if consciousness were one thing and the emptiness of a basic nature another,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: 'du byed kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang gzhan la /
translated: and that compounded phenomena are another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la /
translated: and that consciousness is another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: mig kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: mig kyang gzhan la /
translated: and that the eyes are another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: rna ba'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: rna ba'ang gzhan la /
translated: and that the ears are another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: sna'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: sna'ang gzhan la /
translated: and that the nose is another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,🔽and that the tongue is another;

original: lce'ang gzhan la; rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lce'ang gzhan la; rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: lus kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: lus kyang gzhan la /
translated: and that the body is another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: yid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: yid kyang gzhan la /
translated: and that the mind is another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: gzugs kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: gzugs kyang gzhan la /
translated: and that forms are another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: sgra'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: sgra'ang gzhan la /
translated: and that sounds are another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,

original: dri'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: dri'ang gzhan la /
translated: and that smells are another;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and that the emptiness of inherent existence is one thing,🔽and that tastes are another.

original: ro'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: ro'ang gzhan la /
translated: the nature of the eyes is empty of the nature of the eyes,🔽and the nature of emptiness is also empty of the nature of emptiness.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan /🔽reg kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan / reg kyang gzhan la /
translated: The nature of the ears is empty of the nature of the ears,🔽and the nature of emptiness is also empty of the nature of emptiness.
